00016 class Boo_Group extends Boo_Io {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Table name.
00020      */
00021     const TABLE_NAME = 'boo_groups';
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief Primary key.
00025      */
00026     const PRIMARY_KEY = 'group_id';
00027     
00028     /**
00029      * @brief Default constructor.
00030      * @param int $groupId[optional] Group ID.
00031      * @return void.
00032      */
00033     public function __construct($groupId = false) {
00034         parent::__construct(self::TABLE_NAME, self::PRIMARY_KEY);
00035         
00036         // defaults
00037         $this->setPermisions(4); // read only
00038         
00039         if ($groupId) {
00040             $this->open($groupId);
00041         }
00042     }
00043     
00044     /**
00045      * @brief Gets array of groups.
00046      * 
00047      * @return Returns array of groups, key is the group ID, value is the group name.
00048      */
00049     public static function getGroups() {
00050         $dbh = Boo_DB::connect();
00051         $stmt = $dbh->prepare("SELECT {$this->primaryKey}, name FROM {$this->tableName}");
00052         
00053         $stmt->bindColumn('group_id', $groupId);
00054         $stmt->bindColumn('name', $name);
00055         
00056         try {
00057             $stmt->execute();
00058             $results = $stmt->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00059             
00060             if (empty($results)) {
00061                 trigger_error('No groups were found', E_USER_NOTICE);
00062                 return false;
00063             } else {
00064                 // found groups, make array
00065                 $tmp = array();
00066                 foreach ($results as $row) {
00067                     $tmp[$row['group_id']] = $row['name'];
00068                 }
00069                 
00070                 return $tmp;
00071             }
00072         } catch (Exception $e) {
00073             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00074             return false;
00075         }
00076     }
00077     
00078     /**
00079      * @brief Group permissions.
00080      * 
00081      * Permissions are simmilar to GNU/Linux:
00082      * \li 1 = --x
00083      * \li 2 = -w-
00084      * \li 3 = -wx
00085      * \li 4 = r--
00086      * \li 5 = r-x
00087      * \li 6 = rw-
00088      * \li 7 = rwx
00089      * 
00090      * @param int $permissions The permissions.
00091      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00092      * @todo Fix permisions.
00093      */
00094     public function setPermissions($permissions) {
00095         $permissions = (int) $permissions;
00096         
00097         if ($this->isPermissions($permissions)) {
00098             $this->set('permissions', $permissions);
00099         } else {
00100             return false;
00101         }
00102     }
00103     
00104     /**
00105      * @brief Determins if permissions are valid.
00106      * 
00107      * @see Boo_Group::setPermissions().
00108      * @param int $permissions The permissions.
00109      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00110      */
00111     public function isPermsisions($permissions) {
00112         $permissions = (int) $permissions;
00113         
00114         if ($permissions >= 1 && $permissions <= 7) {
00115             return true;
00116         } else {
00117             return false;
00118         }
00119     }
00120     
00121     /**
00122      * @brief Sets the group name.
00123      * 
00124      * @param string $name The group name.
00125      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00126      */
00127     public function setName($name) {
00128         $name = strtodb($name);
00129         
00130         if (Boo_Validator::isString($name, 1, 32)) { // do not use Boo_Validator::isName()
00131             return $this->set('name', $name);
00132         } else {
00133             trigger_error("Name {$name} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00134             return false;
00135         }
00136     }
00137     
00138     /**
00139      * @brief Gets the groups name.
00140      * 
00141      * @return string Returns the groups name if set, FALSE otherwise.
00142      */
00143     public function getName() { return $this->get('name'); }
00144     
00145     /**
00146      * @brief Sets the groups description.
00147      * 
00148      * @param string $description The group description.
00149      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00150      */
00151     public function setDescription($description) {
00152         $description = strtodb($description);
00153         
00154         if (Boo_Validator::isString($description, 0, 255)) {
00155             return $this->set('description', $description);
00156         } else {
00157             trigger_error("Description {$description} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00158             return false;
00159         }
00160     }
00161     
00162     /**
00163      * @brief Gets the group description.
00164      * 
00165      * @return string Returns the groups description if set, FALSE otherwise.
00166      */
00167     public function getDescription() { return $this->get('description'); }
00168     
00169     /**
00170      * @brief Gets the group permissions.
00171      * 
00172      * @return int Returns group permissions on success, FALSE otherwise.
00173      */
00174     public function getPermissions() { return $this->get('permissions'); }
00175     
00176     /**
00177      * @brief Returns the group ID given a group name.
00178      * 
00179      * @param string $name The group name.
00180      * @return int Group ID on success, FALSE on failure.
00181      */
00182     public static function getGroupIdByName($name) {
00183         if (!$name) {
00184             if (BOO_WARNING) { trigger_error('Name can not be false', E_USER_WARNING); }
00185             return false;
00186         }
00187         
00188         $groupId = 0;
00189         $dbh = Boo_DB::connect();
00190         $stmt = $dbh->prepare("SELECT {$this->primaryKey} FROM {$this->tableName} WHERE name = :name LIMIT 1");
00191         
00192         $stmt->bindParam(':name', $name);
00193         $stmt->bindColumn('group_id', $groupId);
00194         
00195         try {
00196             $stmt->execute();
00197             $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_BOUND);
00198             
00199             if (!$result) {
00200                 trigger_error("Name {$name} is not valid", E_USER_NOTICE);
00201                 return false;
00202             } else {
00203                 // found group id
00204             }
00205         } catch (Exception $e) {
00206             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00207             return false;
00208         }
00209         
00210         return $groupId;
00211     }
00212 
00213     /**
00214      * @brief Determines if a group name already exists.
00215      * 
00216      * @param int $name The group name.
00217      * @return bool Returns TRUE if group name is already in the database, FALSE otherwise.
00218      */
00219     public static function isName($name) {
00220         return self::exists($name, 'name', self::TABLE_NAME, self::PRIMARY_KEY);
00221     }
00222     
00223     /**
00224      * @brief Determines if a group ID already exists.
00225      * 
00226      * @param int $groupId The group ID.
00227      * @return bool Returns TRUE if group ID is already in the database, FALSE otherwise.
00228      */
00229     public static function isGroupId($groupId) {
00230         // allows for group ID of 0
00231         return !(self::exists($groupId, 'group_id', self::TABLE_NAME, self::PRIMARY_KEY) === false);
00232     }
00233 }
